name: Balls Deep Pearl Diving Game
description:
It is time to get down. How low can you go?

Aim and shoot! Your balls are your best friends.

Collect more ballz as you break deeper and deeper in the cave. Try to beat all the levels and see what’s deep inside. Can you reach level 100?

How to Play:
►Point and shoot the ball
►Break the X blocks to continue
►Collect balls to increase your load

Features:
►One Tap Controls
►Quick but Brainbreaking Levels
►Juicy Visuals
►Contrast Themes
►Satisfying Action
►Unlimited gameplay

WARNING! Extremely BOUNCY!
